title: RE60020: Safety Engineering - Quick Facts

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Safety concepts, system safety definition, risk, system safety information operating experience, tests, analysis, safety standards, protective action classification, accidents-consequence, accidents-credibility limit, safety design criteria and principles, Uncertainty in safety measurements. System safety analysis, subsystem fault hazard analysis, common mode failure analysis, cause-consequence approach, hazard simulation technique.
